Text: The Annual Point In Time Count in Orange County is taking place now.  This count has been taking place for years and is critical in targeting resources to address homelessness. https://t.co/5vkFqY3dNF

There is still time to register for today's Immigration Townhall Webinar to learn more about services available through my District Office and important updates. Sign up by visiting:

The price of gasoline is high and is burdening hardworking Americans in my district and across the country. I am proud to co-sponsor the Gas Prices Relief Act to suspend the gas tax until 2023, decrease shipping prices and keep grocery pricing down.

Happy Valentine's Day! The children in #CA46 joined me in thanking our district’s veterans for their sacrifices, service, & bravery! I appreciate everyone who sent in a card. I know our veterans were uplifted & smiled as soon as they opened their cards.
#VeteransValentinesDay https://t.co/56zl5wDCJm

Orange County residents and my constituents rely on public transportation for work, school, and doctor appointments. I am calling for Governor Gavin Newsom to intervene before the OCTA strike to ensure there is a fair result for our drivers and to avoid delays for my community. https://t.co/VjGUvJzVuP

Parents & teachers, please join my office in celebrating Veterans Valentine's Day, to pay tribute and show our appreciation to our Veteran men & women in #CA46! Send in your kids’ & students' Valentine’s Day cards by Friday, February 11. email: CA46Veteranvalentines@gmail.com https://t.co/LslmuMsmGq

Our country promised non-citizen service members & veterans that we would always be there for them in exchange for their services. I applaud the DHS & VA for launching their resource hub that assists & provides resources for our deported veterans. Visit, https://t.co/nhnc5VmhgI

Our postal service is vital for our small businesses, urgent packages, & life-saving medication. I am proud to have voted for the House passage of the bipartisan #PostalServiceReformAct to ensure we protect our mail carriers & provide Americans with high-quality delivery service.

Today, the small business administration launched journey 6, an online platform focused on providing women entrepreneurs with the tools & strategies necessary to expand their businesses. When women succeed, America succeeds. Enroll today by visiting: https://t.co/tjWSJdp71A

I am proud of the House passage of the #AmericaCOMPETES Act today. We are creating long-term economic growth for Americans, strengthening our supply chains, and securing the U.S. competitive advantage.

I am proud that it includes my HOPR Act which supports our national security and U.S. small businesses by ensuring The Department of Homeland Security has high-quality uniforms and equipment made in America.
The America COMPETES Act is legation that’s important to our nation's future. It addresses the supply chain crisis, invests in U.S businesses, and creates American jobs. https://t.co/XpdZIkoqFu

We have outstanding community members as our teachers, school bus drivers, medical care providers and others who uplift and make our district better! Join my discussion on "How to Navigate Inflation" with community partner @cap_oc on Feb. 8, from 9 to 10 a.m. We'll be sharing valuable resources on utility assistance, the new federal broadband Affordable Connectivity Program and much more. https://t.co/ATjGEr31cp

Happy #LunarNewYear!
 
2022 marks the year of the Tiger, signaling strength and bravery. I hope this year brings you and your loved ones strength, good fortune and happiness! https://t.co/Nsn4eoqJUG

A reminder to all Californians, today is the last day of open enrollment 2022 to find health insurance that best fits you! Enrollment is open until midnight tonight. To sign up, visit https://t.co/c88fgbxAH9 or speak to a representative at 800-300-1506

Thank you, Director Sethuraman Panchanathan & the NSF, for being a federal partner with me & my district & awarding a $187,881 grant to Chapman University to fund a project that integrates braille & graphics on the same platform & enhances access to digital information.

As the 2022 tax filing season begins, I am concerned about the IRS backlogs caused by the COVID-19 pandemic impacting businesses and constituents in my community. 🚨🚨 I’m urging @POTUS to cancel up to $50,000 in student loan debt for every American.
 
It’s time to ensure that student debt isn’t an obstacle to the next gen achieving the American Dream. 
#CancelStudentDebt

Do you have questions about what steps to take to become a U.S. Citizen? Naleo is hosting a virtual citizenship workshop for our community on Saturday, March 19, 2022 from 9:00 a.m.  - 2:00 p.m. To register and receive free assistance call 888-839-8682. https://t.co/oA0LxU6fxU

The @WhiteHouse has opened a line for those wanting to order their free COVID tests by phone. Call 1-800-232-0233 anytime between 8AM and midnight daily to get started.

Today I voted in support of the EVEST Act. This legislation is simple, important, and eliminates the red tape. It ensures our Veterans are automatically enrolled into the VA health care system during their transition to civilian life. https://t.co/WpDbwPGSC8
The Covid—19 pandemic has impacted our children’s mental health. With my colleagues, I called for fully funding school-based mental health services.
Trong khi chúng ta tiếp tục chiến đấu với đại dịch COVID-19, vào tuần tới, Cơ quan Quản lý Biden sẽ cho phép bạn nhận mặt nạ miễn phí tại các hiệu thuốc và trung tâm y tế địa phương trên toàn quốc.

Ahora que continuamos luchando contra la pandemia de Covid-19. La próxima semana, la Administración Biden comenzará a tener las máscaras N95 disponibles en farmacias y centros de salud en toda nuestra nación. Sin costo para los consumidores!

As we continue to fight the Covid-19 pandemic. Next week, the Biden Administration will make masks available for pick up at local pharmacies and health centers across our nation, at no cost to consumers.

Members of the National Guard and Reserve serve their country, and they deserve the same GI benefits as their active duty counterparts. 

Today, I voted to pass the Guard and Reserve GI Bill Parity Act to solve this problem and support our troops.
#EveryDayInUniformCounts https://t.co/hBmKu59V93

Thank you, Chairwoman Jessica Rosenworcel and the FCC, for being a federal partner with me and my district and awarding a $35,503 federal fund to Scholarship Prep in Santa Ana to provide funding for technology and broadband connection to help serve our students and school staff.

Today’s inflation data shows the U.S. consumer price rose by 7% over the past year. We must work to bring inflation down. My constituents cannot afford to pay for necessities as food and gas with increased prices.

We are seeing cases of covid-19 and flu infections. Now is the time to make sure you get your annual flu shot! By getting your flu shot, you help protect your family and community from serious illnesses. Sign up for your appointment today at https://t.co/kOxVwlVZUi

Thank you, Secretary Pete Buttigieg and the Federal Aviation Administration, for being a federal partner with me and my district and awarding a $250,000 federal fund to the North Orange County Community College District to create new jobs and support workforce development. #Jobs

RT if you agree: The Senate should support voting rights and pass the #JohnLewisVotingRightsAct

As a co-sponsor of this legislation, I believe that we must protect our democracy and ALL Americans from voter suppression.

#VotingRightsNow

Today’s jobs report brings good news: the unemployment rate is down to 3.9%. This is the largest calendar year drop in history, and it shows that #BidenEconomy is working for working people.

As Covid-19 persists and case numbers rise across the nation, the most efficient and safe way to keep our communities healthy is to wear a mask, get vaccinated, and be boosted. To find a location near you, visit: https://t.co/NnlSL8VMRr

I’m co-sponsoring a resolution to declare January 6th “Democracy Day” so that future generations never forget the bravery and heroism that got us through. 
#DemocracyDay

A year ago today, an insurrection threatened to disrupt the 220-year American tradition of the peaceful transition of power.

But in the end, democracy won.

RETWEET to tell the Senate that we need a meaningful immigration reform in #buildbackbetter. It’s time we delivered for our Dreamers,essential workers, farmers and TPS holders who continue to feed and take care of our country.

For 35 years, the people have placed their trust in us to deliver immigration reform. 

35 years. 

The parliamentarian’s ruling is beyond disappointing—But we aren’t done yet. 

We can’t let this moment slip away. Simple change in registry date, that’s all I ask. #TheTimeIsNow https://t.co/BV1y2gTLBj

I am proud to cosponsor H.Res.100, which calls on @POTUS to cancel federal student loan debt.Student loan repayments are set to resume in February, but Americans are continuing to feel the economic burden of Covid.We must act to #CancelStudentDebt & extend student loan repayment.
@HouseDemocrats secured another payment of the #ChildTaxCredit from the American Rescue Plan and is hitting bank accounts – helping working families ahead of the holidays.
Today I voted to raise the debt limit to secure social security for our seniors, disability payments for our veterans, and keep our economy stable.

@RepSpanberger and I are moderating a #supplychain roundtable to listen to your concerns and find creative solutions.

We in Congress can and should do more to ensure goods and services are more affordable.

#Supplychain issues are hurting our transition to green energy.
 
The U.S. solar industry is now projected to grow 25% less than thought during 2022, primarily due to supply issues.
 
Congress must do more to ease supply chain backlogs and lower costs.
I am glad to see the department of HHS award a grant of 1,701,903 to Serve the People, Inc. in my district. This grant will help my constituents receive quality health care services.
71,000 working families in my district benefit from the #ChildTaxCredit. The #BuildBackBetter Act improves and extends it to ensure that families can put food on the table and afford essential goods.
